p: In many instances, action to reduce emissions requires that we change our behaviour, for example using active transport or public transport to get to work, choosing to connect to meetings online rather than flying and choosing plant‐based food and beverages. The United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP) Little Book of Green Nudges offers guidance on how to make the sustainable options easy, attractive, social and timely [12]. Institutions can also take part in the initiative by testing ‘green nudges’ and sharing lessons learned.
